DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is the comparison of the effect-site concentration of remifentanil for blunting hemodynamic responses to ordinary tracheal and double-lumen endobronchial intubation during propofol-remifentanil total intravenous anesthesia.
DOC.brief_title: Effect-site Concentration of Remifentanil for Blunting Hemodynamic Responses to Double-lumen Endobronchial Intubation
DOC.criteria: Adult patient who is needed intubation for general anesthesia patient who is anticipating difficult airway patient who takes any drug to influence this study cardiovascular disease, renal disease, liver disease
